Title: Establishes a central business district toll exemption for first responders
Summary: Establishes a central business district toll exemption for first responders employed by the state, any municipality, a recognized corporation or authority, or certified organization, thereof who are performing any part of their duties in the central business district.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a central business district toll exemption for first responders
